pr_title: Fix support for multiple Realms by same user

timeline.message: Fix support for multiple Realms by the same user and let OS calculate the file path instead of doing it in Java.

timeline.bodyText:
Was this one not intentionally left out to align feature set with other SDKs?
I guess it could be added to the other SDKs with realm/realm-object-store#1049, but would it then also make sense to consider adding the directory method in the same go?
timeline.author: rorbech

replies.bodyText:
It was left out because I wasn't clear exactly how we could support it with the current OS API's. But it is pretty useful, which is why I'm adding it back in the OS PR.
The directory is kinda supported by using AppConfig.syncRootDirectory(), which is good enough IMO. I think it make sense for us to control the intermediate layout in order to be able to support multiple Realms from different apps/users.
replies.author: cmelchior

timeline.message: Add support for multiple partions for the same user

Merge branch 'v10' into cm/support-multiple-realms-pr-user
